casebody.data:
CLEAR-LINE CHEMICALS, INC. and Howard Mescon, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. PALMERO HEALTH CARE and Kenneth Palmero, Defendants-Appellees. No. 02-1331. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: Feb. 10, 2003.

Before MAYER, Chief Judge, PLAGER, Senior Circuit Judge, and GAJARSA, Circuit Judge.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
